Package com.techelevator.tenmo.services

Class TransferTypeService

java.lang.Object
com.techelevator.tenmo.services.TransferTypeService
public class TransferTypeService extends Object
This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the Account table and securely passing it to the View.
Author:
Jayden Southworth, Kadeam Howell

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TransferTypeService(String baseUrl)
    This constructor is used to initialize the REST template and pass the server's URL and the specified endpoint to subsequent APIs.

    Method
    Description
    TransferType
    getTransferFromId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int transId)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's type based on the transfer's type ID.
    TransferType
    getTransferType(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, String desc)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's type based on the filtered description passed into the desc parameter.

  • Constructor Details

    • TransferTypeService

      public TransferTypeService(String baseUrl)
      This constructor is used to initialize the REST template and pass the server's URL and the specified endpoint to subsequent APIs.

  • Method Details

    • getTransferType

      public TransferType getTransferType(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, String desc)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's type based on the filtered description passed into the desc parameter.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      desc - Takes a passed-in transfer type description and appends it to the endpoint filter.
      Returns:
      transfer types matching the passed-in description.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • getTransferFromId

      public TransferType getTransferFromId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int transId)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer's type based on the transfer's type ID.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      transId - Takes a passed-in transfer type ID and appends it to the endpoint.
      Returns:
      transfer types matching the passed-in transfer type ID.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.
